title: The Goal
abstract: Will Bella's love of soccer help her change her ways? 'Screen It' 2015 Winner - Primary Live Action.
description: Meet Bella, a soccer obsessed ten year old. She eats, breathes and dreams soccer. There's just one problem. She would rather eat junk food while watching a match on TV than actually play the game herself. When a freak accident occurs, everyone mistakes her for a soccer superstar. However, due to her lack of soccer skills she fails miserably. Will she change her attitude towards exercise or remain a couch potato forever?
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2003152; 'Screen It' 2015 [winning entries and special mentions]; Active; 2015
